medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain woke him up at 6:00 am and progressively worsened. Associated with nausea, no vomiting, flatus, and anorexia. Pain aggravated with walking and radiates slightly to the back.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, hypercholesterolemia, depression. Past surgical history includes left rotator cuff surgery, left knee surgery, and right big toe surgery in remote past.
